name: Pearl
summary:
Set inside their home, a beloved hatchback, Pearl follows a girl and her dad as they crisscross the country chasing their dreams.
It’s a story about the gifts we hand down and their power to carry love. And finding grace in the unlikeliest of places.
info:
• 中文名: 珍珠
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: 车载歌行
  • 上映年度: 2016年5月20日
  • 片长: 5分38秒
  • 导演: Patrick Osborne
